name: One Putt
description:
One Putt is a 2D puzzle platformer where the player takes the form of a golf ball, and must use gravity to navigate each level.

Controls:
Click to Putt, Space to toggle gravity sources, E to restart level.

There's also a janky in-house levelbuilder that can be activated by pressing 'R'. It was used to make the game and will be receiving major updates after the levels overhaul.

Thanks for playing!
